report.title: Ephedra With a Twist
report.author: The Lorax
report.bodytext: To start, let me give you my brief psychoactive history: /n /n -Pot (All the time; from mellowed out, to outer space) /n -DXM (4 or 5 times; unenjoyable) /n -Codeine/Perc/Vicodin (roughly 15 times; fun fun fun!) /n -Mushrooms (3 times; completely changed my life for the better) /n -Alcohol /n -Tobacco (semi-regularly) /n -Dimenhydrinate (with no hallucinations) /n /n The night started with a trip to the grocery store. I was originally there to pick up a few legit items (bread, milk, eggs), but made a quick detour to the 'natural lifestyle' section, coming across a bottle of 40 pills, each containing 400mg Yohimbe and 200mg Vitamin C. I made the purchase, came home, and read more on Yohimbe. /n /n As you probably know, Yohimbe is a stimulant, aphrodisiac, and sometimes used to treat cases of erectile dysfunction. The aphrodisiac properties were what interested me, as my girlfriend L and I both enjoyed other forms of inebriated sex. Mindset: curious, overall positive. /n /n T=0:00 - Ingest two pills, orally, with plenty of water. /n /n T=0:30 - Not feeling anything, drop one more. /n /n T=1:30 - Increased heart rate, slight anxiety, over all a lot like a high dose of caffeine. /n /n T=2:00 L gets off work, and we decide to go to a movie. I tell her about the Yohimbe; she's very interested, and asks me how it feels. I tell her I'm speedy, but find it to be more un-arousing than anything else. I drop two more Yohimbe capsules, and 1 25mg Diphenhydramine pill to cut the edge. /n /n T=2:30 I have a good balance of energy going. The Yohimbe gives energy, and the Diphenhydramine takes away the unpleasant anxiety and heart-jumping. I'll try not to be graphic, but for the sake of science, I was also harder (and maybe a little bit bigger) than I've ever been in my entire life. L commented on this too, and LOVED it. Oral sex felt INCREDIBLE (more than usual). /n /n T=3:30 We arrive at the theater too late, and decide to bring a movie back home. En route, we have sex. Once again, very very very good. /n /n T=7:30 It's about midnight, L goes home. I don't think sleeping will be a problem. /n /n T=9:00 Sleeping is a problem. I lie in bed with racing thoughts, and although my heart rate is only slightly elevated, I can not sleep. /n /n T=9:30 25mg Diphenhydramine ingested, my last one. /n /n T=10:00 Shallow sleep for 6 hours. /n /n SUMMARY: /n Although the stimulant and aphrodisiac properties of Yohimbe were fun, I can only imagine what this is doing to damage my heart. Not sleeping was no fun either; I'm writing this the morning after and I feel run-down. Diphenhydramine worked perfectly for me, and I know I could have gotten to sleep if I had had 25-50mg more to take before going to bed.
